title: 60 Minutes - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/22/21
itunes:title: 60 Minutes - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/22/21
description:
George Noory and former 60 Minutes producer Ira Rosen discuss his long career working on the famed TV news magazine show, the competitive nature of reporters like Mike Wallace, and important stories they covered like the opioid epidemic, insider trading by congressmen and even former President Jimmy Carter's interest in UFOs.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
